mapper.insert: insert into member values( #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{memBirth}, default, #{memTel}, #{memAddr}, #{memEmail}, default, to_date('01/01/01','RR/MM/DD'), default )
mapper.select: select * from member where MEM_STATUS = 'Y' and MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.update: update member set MEM_STATUS = 'N', MEM_DELDATE = SYSDATE where MEM_ID = #{memId}
